com.stabilit.scm.common.listener
Class PerformancePoint

java.lang.Object
  com.stabilit.scm.common.listener.ListenerSupport<IPerformanceListener>
      com.stabilit.scm.common.listener.PerformancePoint

public final class PerformancePoint
extends ListenerSupport<IPerformanceListener>

The Class PerformancePoint. Allows notifying performance - fire begin/end. Pay Attention: PerformancePoint works with ThreadLocal to find the begin event when a end event is fired. So if begin and end event is fired by different threads performancePoint doesn't work.
